N Nd5!? very interesting move by white, he forces the exchange of knight by bishop.. still not sure what he aims with this strategic decision, but it seams very interesting indeed

now i expect one of two possible choices:
a) Qb3 a nice threat on f3 but also a miss directed threat against b7, a poisoned pawn if white take he loses a rook
b) Bb5 the more appealing choice in white's point of view, but allows me to force an isolated pawn for white with cxd4
